item.title: Device forensic with MVT
item.description: Disclaimer # Mobile Verification Toolkit (MVT) is a tool to facilitate the consensual forensic analysis of Android and iOS devices, for the purpose of identifying traces of compromise. MVT’s purpose is not to facilitate adversarial forensics of non-consenting individuals’ devices.
